page.title: 10W.WHITECHURCH - FARMING.
page.content:
{CHESCOMBE FARM,}WINTERBORNE WHITE- CHURCH has a herd of over 300 Hereford and Friesian cows which are, presently milked three times a day. Wheat is the main crop sown with Avalon, Galahad, Rapier and Huntsman the varieties grown. Iqri and Triumph barley are also sown. {LA LEE FARM}has a herd of 120 Friesian cows with another 120 calves and heifers. Their large flock of sheep is kept in fields outside the survey area. The farm sows more barley than wheat. {DEVEREL FARM}has a herd of 170 Friesian cows and 200 acres of grain.
Good quality barley is sent to the breweries to brew ale but if the crop is inferior it is used for fodder. All farms grow turnips and fodder beet.
